name: Rob Lewis
title: Senior Financial Writer
bio: Rob is a senior writer at Financial Outlook, with more than 10 years of experience in business and wealth journalism. Passionate and detail-oriented, he has a proven track record of reliability and fairness that sets him apart from others. Always looking for the next big story!

name: Sarah Chen
title: Chief Market Analyst
bio: Sarah brings 15 years of Wall Street experience, specializing in macroeconomic trends and wealth management strategies. Former Goldman Sachs analyst turned independent voice.

name: Marcus Rodriguez
title: Crypto & Blockchain Editor
bio: Marcus has been covering cryptocurrency since 2017. He predicted the 2021 bull run and now helps readers navigate the next wave of digital assets and DeFi.
